component.name: Shuusou Gyoku (Engine)
秋霜玉（エンジン）
秋霜玉（引擎）
component.summary: ReC98 source port of the first Seihou Project game

description.p: Requires the data files of an existing game copy. If they are missing, the game indicates their expected location at startup.
MIDI playback is not yet implemented for Linux. To get background music, download and set up a BGM pack through the Config → Sound / Music → BGMPack option.

This release comes bundled with IPAMonaGothic, a free and metric-compatible alternative for the MS Gothic font used in the original Windows version. For pixel-perfect text rendering, put msgothic.ttc into one of your system's standard font directories, as listed by fc-cache -v.

screenshot.caption: The new window and fullscreen scaling options
Use the new BGM modding feature to bring ZUN's intended SC-88Pro sound onto any system

description.p: ⚠️ Fixed a gameplay-forking bug in the rotation calculation of Marisa's bits, introduced in P0295. In rare cases, the now restored original behavior might invalidate and desync Extra Stage replays recorded on ≥P0295 and ≤P0310-1.

ul.li: Extra Stage replays recorded in ≥P0295 were highly likely to desync
≥P0217 saved twice as many replay frames as necessary

description.p: Watching an affected replay will now repair the desync and recompress the file. Marking the replay file as read-only bypasses both fixes.

ul.li: Optional screenshot compression using lossless WebP, with a configurable size/speed tradeoff
Screenshots are now placed into a screenshots/ subdirectory within the game data folder, without the 秋霜 prefix
Build tag in the bottom-right corner of the main menu
Fixed vanishing Music Room and in-game music title text after using hotkeys

description.p: Fixed controller support for the Flatpak release
